# nexus-tooltip



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                                                                 | Type                                           | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `allowClick` | `allow-click` | Allows tooltip to persist on click to trigger.                                                                              | `boolean`                                      | `true`      |
| `attrId`     | `attr-id`     | The Unique identifier for the tooltip. If none is provided one will be added by default.                                    | `string`                                       | `undefined` |
| `placement`  | `placement`   | Position of the tooltip (top, right, bottom, left). If nothing is provided, it will be calculated based on the screen size. | `"" \| "bottom" \| "left" \| "right" \| "top"` | `''`        |


----------------------------------------------
